name: Leagen
description:
You have to kill monsters to gain falsities. Gather enough, and you will be able to play the next level.

This game was made for the Community Gamejam 2019 with the theme "The Game Is A Liar"

Use WASD/ZQSD to move,
Space/LMB to shoot/interact.
Press Escape to Pause/Unpause/Exit menus.
